regen.absent_element: prevention of simultaneous execution of multiple modes
regen.new_specification: The system shall prevent the simultaneous operation of more than one mode under the Operations State.

regen.absent_element: prevention of simultaneous execution of multiple modes
regen.new_specification: The system shall prevent the simultaneous execution of normal, training, and maintenance modes in the Operations State.

regen.absent_element: transition between modes in the Operations State
regen.new_specification: The system shall enable transition between normal, training, and maintenance modes within the Operations State.

label: The Operations State modes shall not exist concurrently.
absence: action of prohibiting multiple modes from running simultaneously
